description:
misc/dashboard/codereview: record Message-ID of code review thread mails.

This will allow us to properly thread "R=..." mails at a later time.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0015b419f213 ***

misc/dashboard/codereview: record Message-ID of code review thread mails.

This will allow us to properly thread "R=..." mails at a later time.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6135053

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 6135053: misc/dashboard/codereview: record Message-ID of code re...
